member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprConsentExtension
member.summary: Extension methods to register required JS Interop services into IServiceCollection

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprConsentExtension.AddGdprConsent(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers required JS Interop services into IServiceCollection

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprBanner.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor ElementReference of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprBanner.Content
member.summary: HTML Content of the collapse panel.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprBanner.BannerBackgroundColor
member.summary: Sets the style of the HTML div background-color. Use HTML specified: Color Names, RGB, HEX or with HSL values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprBanner.BannerOpacity
member.summary: Opacity of the overlay div. Value should be between 0..1. Where 0 means the overlay layer is not visible.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprBanner.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Arbitrary HTML attributes e.g.: tabindex="1" will be passed to the corresponding rendered HTML element.
